Description.Text: Hyatt Regency Bishkek is an elegant 5-star hotel offering spacious accommodation in the heart of Bishkek. It boasts extensive leisure and wellness facilities, a Mediterranean restaurant, free parking and an excellent location opposite the State Opera and Ballet Theatre. Sverdlovsky is a major business and administrative district in central Bishkek, notable for its wide boulevards and marble-faced public buildings. Nearby places of interest include the State Opera and Ballet Theatre, the Museum of Fine Arts, Ala-Too Square, the State Historical Museum and Osh Bazaar. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Bishkek destinations. The hotel occupies a large mid-rise building featuring a flat facade with contemporary glass entrance. Facilities include a plunge pool, gym, steam room, whirlpool, saunas, three spa treatment rooms and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Deluxe rooms are 48sqm and decorated in a modern style with rich oak furniture. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, a 25-inch satellite/cable TV, safe, small sitting area and chargeable wired internet. The en-suite bathrooms feature bathrobes and a walk-in shower. Crostini serves Mediterranean cuisine in a modern setting with an open kitchen, whilst Breeze is a seasonal restaurant offering barbeque dishes in a casual ambience by the pool. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the stylish Bar@191. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service.
